item.title: CVE-2024-1857|2024-03-16T08:37:16.003Z -- wpswings -- ultimate%20gift%20cards%20for%20woocommerce%20%E2%80%93%20create%2C%20redeem%20%26%20manage%20digital%20gift%20certificates%20with%20personalized%20templates
item.description: The Ultimate Gift Cards for WooCommerce â€“ Create, Redeem & Manage Digital Gift Certificates with Personalized Templates plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 2.6.6 via the wps_wgm_preview_email_template(). This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to read password protected and draft posts that may contain sensitive data.
